human: Try to tell me what is written in this page?

gpt:
The page contains a letter. Here's the transcription:

---

RICHARD M. NIXON
P.O. BOX 1968
TIMES SQUARE STATION
NEW YORK, N.Y. 10036

July 29, 1968

Dear Bobby:

This is just a note to express my appreciation for your support and endorsement. I am extremely pleased and honored to have you on our campaign team.

I know that your excellent talent and gift of communication will make a substantial contribution towards our achieving a great victory in November.

Anything you can do to help Cy Laughter, who is working with the Sports Committee, will be most welcome. Cy has a tremendous job ahead and your assistance will be most meaningful to us.

With very best wishes,
Sincerely,
[Dick Nixon's signature]

Mr. Bobby Richardson
47 Adams Avenue
Sumter 17, South Carolina

---
